availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Knorr (Newport, Kentucky farmer and felon)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Hanover, Germany. Married to Sophia Sheele Knorr in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on December 28, 1857. Father of Rosa Knorr and Theresa Knorr. Farmer in Newport in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 214.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 9, p. 215A.
